text: Kaakki is a 2007 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Bibin Prabhakar, starring Prithviraj and Mukesh in the lead roles. http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/3939/malayalam/khaki/index.htm ==Location== Major location of this movie was Kozhikode. ==Cast== *Prithviraj as S.I Unnikrishnan Nair *Mukesh as H.C Ramakrishnan Nair *Manasa *Meera Vasudev as Sethulakshmi, wife of HC Ramakrishnan Nair *Nawab Shah as Parthipan *Nedumudi Venu as Balakrishnan Nair * Janardhanan as Bahuleyan *Jagathy Sreekumar as Karunakaran Nair *Mamukkoya as Chekkutty *Chandra Lakshman as Meenakshi *Bindu Panicker *Kalabhavan Shajohn as Constable Suraj *Bheeman Raghu as D.I.G *Kundara Johny as S.P Mahesh *P. Sreekumar as Chairman *Subair *Santhosh *Santhosh Jogi *Jayan Cherthala *Ponnamma Babu as Padmini *Sudheesh as Harikrishnan *Bindu. C. C as lady constable == Soundtrack == == Reception == ==References== ==External links== * Category:2007 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Kaakki
